job_tasks.phrase: designing and implementing systems that interact with our evolving AI-powered platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the development of software systems that integrate with an existing AI platform, aligning with the 'building applications around them' aspect of Software Development in the context of AI.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure
job_tasks.justification: These are core tenets of software development, focusing on the quality and robustness of the delivered product.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, testing, maintaining, and deploying software in the Flutter framework and Dart language.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly describes the full software development lifecycle for mobile applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing user interface components and implementing them by following well-known Flutter / Dart workflows and practices.
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on the front-end aspect of software development, specifically UI implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Communicating with product and engineering leads to implementing business and project objectives.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand and implement business goals, which is central to business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Code review of team members' commits as part of CI/CD cycle.
job_tasks.justification: Involvement in CI/CD cycles, including code reviews, is a key aspect of operations engineering for ensuring smooth deployments and code quality.

soft_skills.phrase: Communicating with product and engineering leads
Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.
play a key role in the development and delivery of our mobile Apps.

classification.rationale: The job description primarily focuses on traditional mobile application development using Flutter and Dart, with a general mention of interacting with an 'AI-powered platform'. There is no deep engagement with AI model development, fine-tuning, or specific GenAI frameworks, which are central to the GenAI Engineer profile.
